channel.title: Comments on: vi with Agile Staffordshire
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Learn vi with Agile Staffordshire | Trevweb
item.dc:creator: Learn vi with Agile Staffordshire | Trevweb
item.description: […] Learning how to use a tool is one of the best value-for-time activities for a software developer. Vi isn’t a new tool; on the contrary it has a long and distinguished history as an editor. There’s a real treat planned this evening with Agile Staffordshire and I encourage you to stop by and join in. Details are available on the Agile Staffordshire Blog. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Learning how to use a tool is one of the best value-for-time activities for a software developer. Vi isn’t a new tool; on the contrary it has a long and distinguished history as an editor. There’s a real treat planned this evening with Agile Staffordshire and I encourage you to stop by and join in. Details are available on the Agile Staffordshire Blog. […]
